name: Storicity Inc.
description: Developer of a travel planning platform designed to recommend popular tourist destinations. The company's platform creates mobile audio guides through its artificial intelligence (AI) based chatbot that offers information about artifacts, and monuments while also providing assistance with a travel itinerary, enabling domestic and inbound individuals to plan their vacations in an efficient manner.
one_liner: Developer of a travel planning platform designed to recommend popular tourist destinations. The company's platform creates mobile audio guides through its artificial intelligence (AI) based chatbot that offers information about artifacts, and monuments while also providing assistance with a travel itinerary, enabling domestic and inbound individuals to plan their vacations in an efficient manner.
